title: Bug 17383create getter/setter  no explicit hint if getter/setter already exist
description: Bug 17383create getter/setterno explicit hint if getter/setter already exist However,there's no explicit way to show this. I can figure out by selecting the type(only not existing getter/setter are shown).
OB: Create getter/setter seems to know which getter/setters exist already. If I select a field, I see all thesetter/getter of the type and I loose the information which setter and getterexist already.
SR: If I select a field, I see all thesetter/getter of the type and I loose the information which setter and getterexist already.
